description: Teen Repellent generates irritatingly high frequency sounds similar to that of a mosquito. As one gets older they lose the ability to hear these high frequency sounds thereby limiting the target audience to a certain age group and animals. Such uses for these high frequency sounds include. Dog whistles, Covert Ringtones, Repel loitering teenagers outside stores, Annoying your classmates without alerting teacher, Sending secret signals without alerting adults, Annoying your children as much as then annoy you, Just plain messing with kids. Note: Hearing and target audience will vary by individual. Plug into a pair of speakers for greater crowd control.
